name: Idle City Builder: Tycoon Game
description:
Become the mayor of the city and make it prosper! Build your own settlement and develop it from a tiny village to a full-grown megapolis!

Construct buildings – hire more workers to increase building speed and progress faster. Build living houses but don’t forget about roads and all the required infrastructure – hospitals, schools, gyms, banks, restaurants, sports grounds, gas stations and so on!
The faster you develop your city, the higher will be your budget. Get more money to build more houses!
Upgrade your buildings. Each of them can be improved to make your citizens happier!
Buy vehicles – each town needs police cars, ambulance lorries, and taxi. Don't forget about them and your city will become more comfortable!

That’s why you’ll love Idle City Builder:
- Dynamic gameplay
- Simple controls
- Bright 3D graphics
- Intuitive interface

What are you waiting for? Download Idle City Builder 3D right now and start building your own town!
